title: Please figure out how this Checksum was derived
content:
I have hexadecimal data from first 5 blocks of T5557 125KHz RFID card. The 5th block appear to be some kind of checksum which I like to know how it is derived.

Below are 11 different samples of the data. Rows 1 to 5 in the tables represent block 1 to 5 of T5557 125 KHz RFID card.

(1)

Block Data
Block 1 C9 09 8C F1
Block 2 00 01 01 01
Block 3 79 68 E1 0B
Block 4 00 E1 13 00
Block 5 ED 13 60 29

(2)

Block Data
Block 1 C9 09 8C F1
Block 2 00 01 01 01
Block 3 81 68 E1 0B
Block 4 00 E1 13 00
Block 5 67 ED 6E A2

(3)

Block Data
Block 1 C9 09 8C F1
Block 2 00 01 01 01
Block 3 7A 6A E1 0B
Block 4 00 E1 13 00
Block 5 67 42 43 F4

(4)

Block Data
Block 1 C9 09 8C F1
Block 2 00 01 01 01
Block 3 82 6A E1 0B
Block 4 00 E1 13 00
Block 5 A4 1C 39 4B

(5)

Block Data
Block 1 C9 09 8C F1
Block 2 00 01 01 01
Block 3 83 6A E1 0B
Block 4 00 E1 13 00
Block 5 AF DB 05 31

(6)

Block Data
Block 1 C9 09 8C F1
Block 2 00 01 01 01
Block 3 7B 6C E1 0B
Block 4 00 E1 13 00
Block 5 7C 90 DD F8

(7)

Block Data
Block 1 C9 09 8C F1
Block 2 00 01 01 01
Block 3 84 6C E1 0B
Block 4 00 E1 13 00
Block 5 9E 9F B5 FA

(8)

Block Data
Block 1 C9 09 8C F1
Block 2 00 01 01 01
Block 3 7C 6E E1 0B
Block 4 00 E1 13 00
Block 5 26 35 F2 7B

(9)

Block Data
Block 1 C9 09 8C F1
Block 2 00 01 01 01
Block 3 85 6E E1 0B
Block 4 00 E1 13 00
Block 5 59 40 B0 E4

(10)

Block Data
Block 1 C9 09 8C F1
Block 2 00 01 01 01
Block 3 7E 62 E1 0B
Block 4 00 E1 13 00
Block 5 98 D7 99 2D

(11)

Block Data
Block 1 C9 09 8C F1
Block 2 00 01 01 01
Block 3 8D 62 E1 0B
Block 4 00 E1 13 00
Block 5 94 E0 6E 12

Please note how changes in block 3 column 1 data for samples 1,2,3 and 4,5 and 6,7 and 8,9 and 10,11 affect block 5 data.

Is anyone able to figure out how data in row 5 was derived?

Many thanks in advance.

comments.text: Have you read about how to reverse a CRC? E.g. hackaday.com/2019/06/27/â€¦
Please add more details as to what algorithms have you tried? Why do you think its a checksum? Any other correlation that you have done?

@sudhackar many thanks for your response. I have tried using CRC calculator at sunshine2k.de/coding/javascript/crc/crc_js.html. I think it is a checksum because of the way a single byte change in block 3 affects the data (block 5)
